name: toscanini
description: A library for music score analysis
author: Arman Bahraini, Galina Belolipetski

scripts.test: npm run lint && nyc tape toscanini_tests/*.js | tap-nyc
scripts.gt: npm run lint && nyc tape grade_level_tests/*.js | tap-nyc
scripts.it: npm run lint && nyc tape iterator_tests/*.js | tap-nyc
